description:
As a user with accessibility needs
  I want the website to be accessible
  So that I can use all features regardless of my abilities

elements.name: Verify home page WCAG 2.1 compliance

steps.name: I am on the home page
I run accessibility checks for WCAG 2.1 standards
there should be no accessibility violations on home page

elements.name: Check for critical accessibility violations on home page

steps.name: I am on the home page
I check for critical accessibility issues
there should be no critical accessibility violations on home page

elements.name: Verify navigation accessibility

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test navigation accessibility
navigation elements should be accessible

elements.name: Verify form accessibility on home page

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test form accessibility on home page
form elements should be accessible on home page

elements.name: Verify login page accessibility

steps.name: I am on the login page
I run accessibility checks for WCAG 2.1 standards
there should be no accessibility violations on login page

elements.name: Verify login form accessibility

steps.name: I am on the login page
I run accessibility checks on the login form
the login form should be accessible

elements.name: Verify form labels and associations

steps.name: I am on the login page
I test form labels and associations
form labels should be properly associated

elements.name: Verify buttons and interactive elements accessibility

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin user
I test buttons and interactive elements
buttons and interactive elements should be accessible

elements.name: Verify accessibility consistency across pages

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test accessibility consistency across pages
accessibility should be consistent across all pages

elements.name: Verify color contrast consistency

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test color contrast consistency
color contrast should be consistent across pages

elements.name: Verify keyboard navigation on home page

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test keyboard navigation on home page
keyboard navigation should work on home page

elements.name: Verify keyboard navigation on admin pages

steps.name: I am on the login page
I test keyboard navigation on admin pages
keyboard navigation should work on admin pages

elements.name: Verify ARIA labels and roles

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test ARIA labels and roles
ARIA labels and roles should be proper

elements.name: Verify heading structure

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test heading structure
heading structure should be proper

elements.name: Verify accessibility on mobile viewport

steps.name: I am on the home page
I test accessibility on mobile viewport
the interface should be accessible on mobile viewport

name: Website Accessibility Compliance

description:
As a system administrator
  I want to verify admin access security controls
  So that unauthorized users cannot access admin functions

elements.name: Navigate to admin section and show login form

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I should see the login form elements
all form fields should be visible and accessible

elements.name: Show validation error for empty login form

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I submit the login form with empty fields
I should see an error message for empty credentials
I should remain on the login page

elements.name: Show validation error for invalid credentials

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with invalid credentials "invaliduser" and "invalidpass"
I should see an error message for invalid credentials
I should remain on the login page

elements.name: Show validation error for empty username

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with empty username and password "somepassword"
I should see an error message for missing username
I should remain on the login page

elements.name: Show validation error for empty password

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with username "someuser" and empty password
I should see an error message for missing password
I should remain on the login page

elements.name: Prevent direct access to admin dashboard without login

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate directly to admin dashboard URL
I should be redirected to login page or access denied
I should see the login form
I should not see dashboard elements

elements.name: Handle special characters in login form

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with special characters "user@test.com" and "pass!@#$%^&*()"
I should see an error message for invalid credentials
the form should handle special characters properly

elements.name: Verify login form accessibility

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I check the login form accessibility
all form elements should have proper IDs and attributes
password field should have proper type
submit button should be accessible

elements.name: Verify admin section link is properly labeled

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I am on the home page
I check the admin panel link accessibility
the admin link should be visible and clickable
the admin link should have proper href attribute

elements.name: Verify error message accessibility

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I submit the login form with empty fields
the error message should be accessible
the error message should have proper styling and content

elements.name: Do not display logout button when user is not logged in

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I am on the home page
the logout button should not be visible
I navigate to admin login page
the logout button should still not be visible

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "' OR '1'='1" and "' OR '1'='1"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "admin' --" and "admin' --"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "admin' #" and "admin' #"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "admin' OR 1=1--" and "admin' OR 1=1--"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "admin' OR '1'='1' --" and "admin' OR '1'='1' --"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "admin' OR 1=1#" and "admin' OR 1=1#"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

elements.name: Verify login form is protected against SQL injection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website
I navigate to admin section
I attempt login with SQL injection payload "admin' OR 1=1/*" and "admin' OR 1=1/*"
I should see a generic error message
I should not see SQL error messages or stack traces

name: Admin Access Verification

description:
As a customer
  I want to book a hotel room with calendar verification
  So that I can ensure my dates are correctly selected

elements.name: Verify calendar selection before proceeding with reservation

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for booking tests
I navigate to booking section
I select a room
I select dates "15" to "18"
I verify calendar selection matches expected dates
I get all selected dates from calendar
I verify calendar selection before reservation
the calendar selection verification should pass

elements.name: Verify availability search and room selection

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for booking tests
I navigate to booking section
I fill availability dates "20/07/2025" to "25/07/2025"
I click Check Availability
I select room by price "225"
I verify I am on reservation page
the availability search and room selection should pass

elements.name: Complete full booking flow with date verification - END TO END

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for booking tests
I complete full booking flow with date verification
the complete end-to-end booking flow should pass

elements.name: Verify selected dates in calendar match URL parameters

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for booking tests
I perform availability search
I get dates from URL
I verify calendar selection matches URL dates
the calendar date verification should pass

elements.name: Handle different room types and dates

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for booking tests
I test different room types and dates
the different room types and dates test should pass

name: Enhanced Booking Flow Tests with Calendar Verification

description:
As a customer
  I want to use the contact form functionality
  So that I can communicate with the hotel

elements.name: Navigate to contact section successfully

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I should be on the contact page

elements.name: Fill contact form with valid data

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I fill contact form with valid data
I get form values
form should contain the entered data

elements.name: Handle email validation errors

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I fill form with invalid email
I submit contact form
I verify email validation error
email validation error should be shown

elements.name: Handle blank field validation errors

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I submit empty form
I verify blank field errors
blank field validation errors should be shown

elements.name: Handle field length validation errors

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I fill form with invalid lengths
I submit contact form
I verify field length errors
field length validation errors should be shown

elements.name: Verify contact form success elements

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I complete contact flow
I verify contact success
all success elements should be verified

elements.name: Handle email update and resubmission

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I fill form with invalid email for update test
I submit contact form
I update email and resubmit
I verify contact success
email update and resubmission should work

elements.name: Clear form fields

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I fill form for clearing test
I clear form
form fields should be empty

elements.name: Handle different contact scenarios

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I complete contact flow with different data
different contact scenarios should work

elements.name: Verify all validation error messages

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for contact tests
I navigate to contact section
I submit empty form
I get validation errors
I check for validation debug information
I verify specific validation error messages
all validation error messages should be verified

name: Contact Form Tests

description:
As a user
  I want to navigate through the website menu
  So that I can access different sections with proper scrolling

elements.name: Display all menu links on the page

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I check visibility of all menu links
all menu links should be visible

elements.name: Navigate to Rooms section when Rooms link is clicked

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I scroll away from rooms section
I capture scroll position before clicking rooms
I click on Rooms link
I wait for vertical movement to complete
I verify vertical scroll position has changed
I verify Rooms section is displayed
the Rooms navigation test should be completed

elements.name: Navigate to Booking section when Booking link is clicked

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I scroll away from booking section
I capture scroll position before clicking booking
I click on Booking link
I wait for vertical movement to complete
I verify vertical scroll position has changed
I verify Booking section text is visible
I check that booking header is in viewport
the Booking navigation and scroll test should be completed

elements.name: Navigate to Contact section when Contact link is clicked

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I scroll away from contact section
I capture scroll position before clicking contact
I click on Contact link
I wait for vertical movement to complete
I verify vertical scroll position has changed
I verify Contact section is displayed
the Contact navigation test should be completed

elements.name: Navigate to Amenities section when Amenities link is clicked

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I scroll to bottom of page for amenities
I capture scroll position before clicking amenities
I click on Amenities link
I wait for vertical movement to complete
I verify vertical scroll position has changed
I verify Amenities section text is visible
I check amenities header position in viewport
the Amenities navigation scroll and motion test should be completed

elements.name: Navigate to Location section when Location link is clicked

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I scroll away from location section
I capture scroll position before clicking location
I click on Location link
I wait for vertical movement to complete
I verify vertical scroll position has changed
I verify Location section is displayed
the Location navigation test should be completed

elements.name: Navigate to home when brand link is clicked

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I click on Brand link
I verify navigation back to home page
the Brand navigation test should be completed

elements.name: Verify complete menu navigation flow

steps.name: I am on the hotel booking website for navigation tests
I start comprehensive menu navigation flow test
I test Rooms link navigation in flow
I test Booking link navigation in flow
I test Amenities link navigation in flow
I test Location link navigation in flow
I test Contact link navigation in flow
I test Brand link navigation in flow
the complete menu navigation flow test should pass successfully

name: Menu Navigation Tests

description:
As a user
  I want the website to perform efficiently
  So that I can have optimal user experience with fast load times

elements.name: Load home page within performance thresholds

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I load home page and measure performance
home page should load within performance thresholds

elements.name: Meet Core Web Vitals thresholds on home page

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I measure Core Web Vitals on home page
Core Web Vitals should meet thresholds

elements.name: Load admin login page efficiently

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I load admin login page and measure performance
admin login page should load efficiently

elements.name: Load room management page with optimal performance

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I load room management page and measure performance
room management page should load with optimal performance

elements.name: Load resources efficiently

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I analyze resource loading performance
resources should load efficiently

elements.name: Respond quickly to user interactions

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I test navigation interaction performance
navigation should respond quickly

elements.name: Handle form interactions efficiently

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I test form interaction performance
form interactions should be efficient

elements.name: Perform room creation operations quickly

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I test room creation performance
room creation should be quick

elements.name: Maintain reasonable memory usage

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I monitor memory usage
memory usage should be reasonable

elements.name: Perform consistently across browsers

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I test performance across browsers
performance should be consistent across browsers

elements.name: Perform well on mobile devices

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I test mobile performance
mobile performance should be acceptable

elements.name: Detect performance regressions

steps.name: I am testing website performance with monitoring tools
I check for performance regressions
no significant performance regression should be detected

name: Performance Testing
